name: lastfm_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Last.fm in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. More efficient than calling lastfm_search multiple times. Pass all search queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'Radiohead, Daft Punk, BjÃ¶rk')

detailSteps.code: const query = new URL(window.location.href).searchParams.get('q') || ''; const artists = []; document.querySelectorAll('.grid-items-item-details').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 5) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('.grid-items-item-main-text a.link-block-target'); const auxEl = el.querySelector('.grid-items-item-aux-text'); artists.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href || '', listeners: auxEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); const tracks = []; document.querySelectorAll('.chartlist-row').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 5) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('.chartlist-name a.link-block-target'); const artistEl = el.querySelector('.chartlist-artist a'); const countEl = el.querySelector('.chartlist-count-bar-value'); tracks.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href || '', artist: artistEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', plays: countEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { query, artist_count: artists.length, artists, track_count: tracks.length, tracks };
detailSteps.name: results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
